tasks.title: Implement authentication system
tasks.description: Tasks related to implementing user authentication system.

subtasks.title: User signup
subtasks.description: Create a form for users to sign up with their email and password.

subtasks.title: User login
subtasks.description: Design a login page for users to enter their credentials and access their accounts.

subtasks.title: Reset password
subtasks.description: Implement a feature for users to reset their passwords if forgotten.

tasks.title: Design database schema
tasks.description: Tasks related to designing database schema.

subtasks.title: Define tables and relationships
subtasks.description: Plan and create the structure of the database including tables and their connections.

subtasks.title: Optimize queries
subtasks.description: Improve database performance by optimizing SQL queries.

tasks.title: Develop frontend UI
tasks.description: Tasks related to developing frontend UI.

subtasks.title: Homepage
subtasks.description: Create the main page layout with navigation and key information.

subtasks.title: User profile
subtasks.description: Design a user profile page displaying personal information and settings.

subtasks.title: Settings page
subtasks.description: Develop a settings page for users to manage account preferences.

tasks.title: Deploy to production
tasks.description: Tasks related to deploying the application to production.

subtasks.title: Set up hosting
subtasks.description: Configure server hosting for the application.

subtasks.title: Domain registration
subtasks.description: Register a domain name for the application.

tasks.title: QA and test all major user journeys
tasks.description: Once we feel version one is ready, we need to rigorously test it both internally and externally to identify any major gaps.

tasks.title: Research pricing points of various competitors and trial different business models
tasks.description: We know what we're planning to build for version one. Now we need to finalise the first pricing model we'll use. Keep iterating the subtasks until we have a coherent proposition.

subtasks.title: Research competitor pricing and business models
Outline a business model that works for our solution
Talk to potential customers about our proposed solution and ask for fair price expectancy

tasks.title: Conduct 5 wireframe tests
tasks.description: Ensure the layout continues to make sense and we have strong buy-in from potential users.

tasks.title: Create wireframe prototype
tasks.description: Create a greyscale clickable wireframe prototype to test our asssumptions so far.

subtasks.title: Create clickable wireframe prototype in Balsamiq

tasks.title: Review results of usability tests and iterate
tasks.description: Keep iterating through the subtasks until we're clear on the core concepts for the app.

subtasks.title: Meet to review notes from previous tests and plan changes

tasks.title: Create paper prototypes and conduct 10 usability tests with potential customers

subtasks.title: Create paper prototypes for version one

tasks.title: Market discovery
tasks.description: We need to define and refine our core product. Interviews will help us learn common pain points and help us define the strongest MVP.

tasks.title: Research the market
tasks.description: We need to get a solid overview of the market to ensure we have up-to-date estimates of market size and demand.

tasks.title: Define target market
tasks.description: Tasks related to defining the target market.

subtasks.title: Market research
subtasks.description: Conduct research to identify the target audience and their needs.

subtasks.title: Competitor analysis
subtasks.description: Analyze competitors to understand market trends and strategies.

subtasks.title: Customer personas
subtasks.description: Create detailed customer profiles to guide marketing efforts.

tasks.title: Create marketing strategy
tasks.description: Tasks related to creating a marketing strategy.

subtasks.title: Digital marketing plan
subtasks.description: Outline strategies for online marketing channels like social media and email.

subtasks.title: Offline promotion
subtasks.description: Plan offline marketing activities such as events and partnerships.

tasks.title: Launch marketing campaign
tasks.description: Tasks related to launching a marketing campaign.

subtasks.title: Create ad copies
subtasks.description: Write compelling ad copies for digital advertising.

subtasks.title: Design creatives
subtasks.description: Develop visual assets for marketing materials.

tasks.title: Evaluate campaign performance
tasks.description: Tasks related to evaluating marketing campaign performance.

subtasks.title: Analytical reports
subtasks.description: Generate reports to analyze the effectiveness of the marketing campaign.

subtasks.title: Feedback collection
subtasks.description: Gather feedback from customers to improve future marketing strategies.

subtasks.title: Time management
subtasks.description: Learn effective time management techniques from self-help books.

subtasks.title: Stress reduction
subtasks.description: Explore strategies for reducing stress and improving mental well-being.

subtasks.title: Mindfulness exercises
subtasks.description: Practice mindfulness exercises daily to enhance focus and awareness.

subtasks.title: Breathing techniques
subtasks.description: Learn and practice breathing techniques for relaxation and stress relief.

subtasks.title: Final project
subtasks.description: Complete the final project of the online course to apply learned skills.

subtasks.title: Certificate download
subtasks.description: Download and save the course completion certificate.
